patch.summary: Update Properties in the Specific Registration Pool

get.summary: Get MAC Registration Pools by Network

id.description: Only present for the create operation.
The unique identifier for this MAC registration.

expirationDate.description: Indicates when this registration expires. Will derive from the pool setting if not specified.

revoked.description: If this MAC registration is revoked or not.

macAddress.description: The mac address for this registration. Must be provided on post, and may not be changed.

username.description: A username for this device, it does not reflect an authenticated user that has gone through a real authentication process.

email.description: The email to associate with this device.

createdDate.description: The created date of this device.

isReferenced.description: This registration is referenced by an identity and cannot be deleted.

id.description: The unique identifier for this pool.

name.description: The unique reference name of the pool.

autoCleanup.description: A toggle determining whether MAC registrations that are 24 hours past the expiration time will be automatically removed from the pool.

expirationType.description: Defines the rule for expiration date calculation.

expirationOffset.description: If the expiration type is not specified_date then this field is the offset amount.

expirationDate.description: If the expiration type is specified_date then this field is the related date.

ssidRegex.description: A regex to determine which SSIDs this registration pool will allows access to.

expirationEnabled.description: If the expiration setting is enabled for new MAC registration.

registrationCount.description: Number of registrations in the pool.

createdDate.description: The created date of this pool.

policySetId.description: The policy set of this pool.

isReferenced.description: This pool is referenced by an identity group and cannot be deleted.

networkCount.description: Number of networks associated with this pool.

identityGroupId.description: The identity group of this pool.

identityId.description: The single identity policy of this pool.
